attributes.action: Scrap the need for television licenses for everybody.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If people want to watch the BBC then they can pay a subsciption or watch it on a pay per view basis. People who prefer to watch other channels instead of the BBC should not be made to pay for a channel that they do not want to watch.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
